sentences.sentence: The Greek Prime Minister tells Parliament the country is at war with wildfires as tourists and workers continue to flee the flames.

sentences.sentence: Vladimir Zelensky slams a proposed extension of an EU ban on Ukraine's grain imports as Russia steps up attacks on its silos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Political uncertainty in Spain after Sunday's inconclusive elections, with the two main parties both saying they'll form a government.

sentences.sentence: One man has died and at least 15 people are injured after a storm rocks northwestern Switzerland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Greek Prime Minister, Kriakos Mitsotakis, has described his country as being at war

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: with wildfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The blazes have forced evacuations as they've raged across the country, fueled by strong winds and successive heat waves.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A week-long wildfire on the Greek island of Rhodes has torn past defenses, sending tourists and locals fleeing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The European Union is sending firefighting help to relieve the island's stretched emergency services.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Mitsotakis told Parliament that the country must remain on constant alert. Υπότιτλοι AUTHORWAVE More than 30,000 people fled the fires at the weekend show the damage being wrought by the flames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Many tourists are still scrambling to get home on evacuation flights, as are seasonal hotel workers whose livelihood is now in doubt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Three islands have been forced to organize partial evacuations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Besides Rhodes, Corfu and Evia are trying to keep a step ahead of the flames.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The heat wave is set to continue for at least a few more days across southern and eastern Europe, with governments issuing travel risk warnings, particularly to forested areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Between a spate of Russian attacks on its infrastructure and restrictions by several

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: EU countries, Ukraine's grain exports are facing tough times.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: President Volodymyr Zelensky has slammed a proposed extension of a ban on the import of Ukrainian grain imposed by five neighboring European nations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It is absolutely unacceptable and frankly not European any extension of the borders. Європейське будь-яке продовження обмежень. Європа має інституційну спроможність діяти раціональніше, ніж закривати той чи інший кордон для того чи іншого товару.

sentences.sentence: Ми дуже активно працюємо з усіма, щоб grain to be shipped via the Black Sea, has sharply raised global wheat and corn futures. The Kremlin's actions, including its suspension of its participation in the Black Sea grain initiative, have caused serious volatility to food prices, which will hurt impoverished and hard-hit areas of the world the most.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We urge Russia to stop targeting food supplies and to return, to return to the Black Sea Grain Initiative immediately.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The U.N. Secretary-General has also urged Russia to return to the deal, warning of the devastating impact on the world's most vulnerable populations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine is the world's seventh largest exporter of wheat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Russian drones have attacked two Ukrainian ports on the river Danube,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: just a few hundred meters from Romania, a NATO member country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Officials said seven people were injured in the blasts at Reni and Ismail. Warehouses were damaged along with port infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Just hours after the bombing, the Euronews crew approached the port of Reni and journalist Cristian Popa spoke to the crew of a Romanian barge present at the explosion site. They collected some objects that they said they couldn't reach there because of the explosions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The crew members say that this very thin material could have been part of a drone that fell a few meters away from the barge that coordinated it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Officials said at the time of the attack there were six Romanian ships in Renni harbour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The six ships, after the attack, contacted Port Control Galati and asked for permission to enter the Romanian waters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The possibility of anchoring at the right bank in the Mide Marine area 74 was found as a solution.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: All six ships are anch anchor and are safe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Many residents of Galati, a Romanian town about 20 kilometers from the port of Reni, were woken from their sleep by the explosions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It sounded like an explosion from the furnace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: I don't think that this should happen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And if this thing will spread, I hope God will do something.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Asked about the attacks, the Romanian Ministry of Defense played down the close proximity to Romania. The Russian drone attacks lasted almost four hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Four Ukrainian ports are on the Danube, but Moscow has proved that it's prepared to target them no matter how close they are to a NATO member.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Spain has entered a period of political uncertainty as the country's two main parties both say they hope to take power despite the fact that neither of them have a clear path to forming a government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The right of centre Popular Party, led by Alberto Nunez FeFejo, won the most seats but fell short of a parliamentary majority.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, he's already said he will explore all ways to form a government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Socialist Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez, who performed better than expected in Sunday's poll, has ruled out a second vote, saying democracy can find a formula for a government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He may try to get the hardline pro-independence party, Together for Catalonia, on board.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But its leader, Carles Puigdemont, who's been living in self-imposed exile in Belgium since Catalonia's failed independence bid in 2017 has previously ruled that out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Spain's new parliament will meet in a month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In accordance with official procedure, King Felipe VI is then expected to invite one of the party leaders to try and form a government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A man in his 50s has died in Switzerland after a violent storm swept through the town of La Chaux-de-Fonds on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Around 15 people are also being treated for injuries by emergency services, according to police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The storm did not last long, but the strong gusts of wind caused significant damage reaching speeds of 217 km an hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In its wake is a long line of destruction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Vehicles destroyed, roofs torn off, street furniture scattered on streets and dozens of trees uprooted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Rescue and clearing operations are continuing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Swiss police are also appealing to the public not to put themselves at risk, especially in woodland areas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Le Chaux-de-Fonds sits near the French border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And before reaching Switzerland, the storm hit eastern France, particularly the Dube de Parfum, around midday Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: There, around 30 homes were affected, although the extent of the damage is unknown at this stage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Other cities were also hit by heavy rain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And in the Italian province of Monza and Brianza, a woman was crushed to death by a large tree that suddenly fell on her.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Mass protests across Israel after Parliament adopted a highly controversial law to limit the Supreme Court's powers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Police used water cannons in a bid to disperse crowds as demonstrators clashed with them late into the night and at least 19 were arrested. This first bill is part of a big judicial reform package and will prevent the court from overruling government actions it considers unreasonable. Critics say it gives too much power to politicians and is a threat to democracy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu gave a televised address following the vote.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Today we have launched a democratic process that is in demand.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The process aims to restore the level of balance between the governments, which was here for 50 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We have transferred the reform to the implementation of the parliament so that the elected government can lead the policy in the direction of the majority of the citizens of the country." Opponents see the reform as a transparent power grab that will erode democratic norms and help Netanyahu's fight against his graft charges, something he denies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Others warn the legislation is a first step towards the wish of ultra-nationalists in his coalition government to annex some or all of the occupied Palestinian territories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The bodies of at least 17 people have been recovered

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: after a small wooden boat capsized off the coast of Senegal overnight Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They were found by the Navy early on Monday morning and are believed to be migrants. It's still unclear where they were coming from or their nationalities, but it appears to be the latest tragedy involving desperate people trying to reach Europe. Senegal has seen a surge in migrant boats attempting to reach Spain's Canary Islands, despite the fact that this Atlantic migration route is one of the deadliest in the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Rescuers looking for survivors after a building collapsed in Cameroon's commercial hub Douala in the early hours of Monday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: At least 33 people died and another 20 were injured when the four-story block fell over onto another smaller residential building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Several children are among the victims.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Since Douala's last accident of the sort in 2016, the city council has identified 500 buildings in danger of collapse and is in the process of knocking them down.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But this building was not marked for demolition.
